div.div: Τιτῆνες : the Titans, sons of Uranus and Gaea. Under the lead of Cronus they took possession of heaven, but were cast down by him into Tartarus. Finally Zeus, aided by Gaea, overpowered Cronus and shut him up with the other Titans, Il. 5.898, Il. 14.279.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
